 If you’re excited about this opportunity and eager to learn, please send your resume outlining your interest in the position. We look forward to helping you grow your skills and advance your career in backend development.
 



  





**This is a unpaid internship initially**

title: Senior Software Engineer (.NET Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 We are a forward-thinking team creating cutting-edge, cloud-based communication solutions. Our backend systems leverage the latest C# and .NET Core technologies, deployed in Kubernetes on AWS. We thrive on collaboration, innovation, and crafting scalable, reliable systems that power seamless communication worldwide.
   

  

 If you're a Senior Backend Engineer with a passion for problem-solving, clean code, and modern DevOps practices, we'd love to have you on our team.
   

  

**Role**
 As a Senior Backend Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Major professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Proficiency in additional programming languages such as C++, Python, or Kotlin
* Experience with Asterisk and VoIP protocols, preferably SIP.


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with remote work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Sr Java Back-End Software Engineer
description:
**This is Worldline** 




 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
 



  





**The Opportunity** 




 We are looking for an upbeat
 **Sr Java Back-End Software Engineer** 
 to join our team. During your journey, you will become familiar with all different essential topics related to merchant facing digital services and you will increase your knowledge to step up further and challenge yourself.
 



  





 Being part of a product team, you will transfer the product vision into design, development, and delivery, to own the backlog toward building the right product. As it is a fairly new product\service, there is room for your own interpretation and freedom to steer the content of this role, based on your experience and character.
 



  





 In this role as experienced Engineer, you are expected to be able to grasp the business problem at hand and self-organize to deliver the solution. In this team we don’t delegate features to build but rather problems to solve for our engineers.
 



  





**The team** 




 You will be working in a team that today is working in an empowered way of working where we focus on Individual Contributors and involve engineers in the design process to have very good understanding of the What and Why before moving onto to How. Software engineers take on responsibility to design it, build it and ship it! Everyone in the team is value oriented and customer centric to solve real world merchant problems.
 



  





**Day-to-Day Responsibilities​** 



* You develop solutions for our customers based on current Java technologies (including JavaScript).
* Examine existing code, identify flaws and build solutions to improve it.
* Cooperate optimally with your team on the active sprint to craft new software solutions.
* Support the creation of technical concepts.
* Participate with recommendations regarding knowledge, priorities, and estimates.
* Help complete full software development processes for each assigned project, adhering to company standards and expectations.







**Who Are We Looking For** 




 People who can drive positive change, step up and show what’s next – people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. You have a professional approach, being constructive and finding solutions in the best interest of the business. You also:
 


* Have a Bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or another related field.
* Proven experience in Java and JavaScript.
* Previous experience working with AWS.
* Knowledge of database technologies especially SQL.
* Practical experience with version control systems like Git.
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to connect with both technical and non-technical colleagues.
* Strong analytical skills to effectively process and structure large amounts of information.
* Are a quick learner and self-starting, showing drive and initiatives supporting business goals.
* Are a great teammate who supports his team and puts the business objectives first.



  





  





**Perks & Benefits** 




 At Worldline, you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
 


* Health contribution
* Health check – Every 2:nd year
* Private Health Care Insurance (EuroAccident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.



  





**Shape the evolution** 




 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
 



  





**Learn more about life at Worldline at jobs.worldline.com** 




  





**We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.**

title: Game developer
description:
We are now looking for the best game developer to join us! You have the chance to be a part of creating the best casino games in the online slot industry!
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop and maintain Casino Games for both desktop and mobile browsers
* The technologies you primarily will work with are HTML5, WebGL, Typescript, Pixi, GSAP and Javascript.
* In a team environment that consists of product management, graphic artistry, sound creation, server development and game mechanics, you will contribute to deliver the best casino games in the market today.
* Your main responsibilities are to make the game graphics come alive with spectacular animations, game flow, game mechanics and sounds according to a result delivered by our game servers.


 Who you are
   

  

* You are a Master Google Searcher that have Stackoverflow as your absolute favourite web site.
* You have practical experience of working with OOP in some language and you have a pragmatic approach to software development.
* Taking on technical challenges and solving them is something you take pride in.
* Quality, not only of the code you write, but the delivered system is important to you.
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and take ownership of changes from editor to production system.


 Beneficial skills
   

  

* Working experience of mobile browsers and knowledge about their limitations and how they work in different ways is a big plus.


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Java Software Engineer
description:
Are you a passionate Java developer eager to work on a globally trusted database client produced by a stellar local team? Whether you’re a seasoned engineer or are just starting your journey, we welcome driven, curious minds who thrive on technical challenges.
 



  





 We are looking to extend our core development team with a great Java developer. You may be a senior engineer who has worked with databases, desktop and web applications and has experience in building frameworks, application features, APIs and user interfaces, or maybe you are only starting out on this journey. In any case, you may be a right fit as long as you’re driven, curious and unafraid of technical challenges.
 



  





 Working with various database engines, performance tuning, parsers and syntax analysis, UX, UI, REST APIs, web applications, cloud and AI sounds exciting to your ears. You are result-oriented, eager to take responsibility and love to solve problems.
 



  





 You will be working with DbVisualizer, a universal database IDE trusted by thousands of engineers and data professionals all over the world. DbVisualizer is engineered using Java and this will be your primary domain, but you will deal with other technologies as well. We believe that you have to be tech agnostic to a degree to be successful in this role.
 



  





 We are a compact, highly skilled team that values self-initiative and the ability to turn great ideas into reality. With efficient tools, well-established methodologies, and deep expertise, we foster an environment where ideas and contributions aren’t just acknowledged, they’re celebrated.
 



  





 We’re looking for someone to join us on a long-term journey, contributing to the continuous evolution of our tool and strengthening team synergy. As part of the role you’ll engage directly with our users to understand their needs, help solve their challenges, and identify opportunities for improvement.
 



  





 Our developers work with multi-disciplinary roles where each developer gets to own and participate in the full lifecycle of new features. This means analyzing, architecting, designing, coding, testing, shipping and supporting our new features - so we take full responsibility for the quality, as this is how we differentiate.
 



  





 We are currently enhancing and expanding DbVisualizer by for example adding server-side features, real-time collaboration, and AI capabilities. The details are still in the works, and we need your help in both shaping and building the future of DbVisualizer.
 



  





**Key responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain DbVisualizer, a state-of-the-art database tool trusted by engineers all over the world



  





**Relevant qualifications** 



* Java
* Desktop and web applications
* User interface design
* Cloud services and architecture
* Relational and NoSQL databases
* Experience with JavaScript, Python, React, Node.js is a plus
* Experience with open source projects is a plus



  





**What we offer** 



* A stimulating environment with great colleagues and exciting technical challenges
* A great product trusted by engineers all over the world
* A small company where your contribution really matters



  





 Read more about DbVisualizer and the role here: https://www.dbvis.com/company/jobs/java-software-engineer.pdf
 



  





 Our mission is to build the best database tools on the planet. Does it sound like the right kind of challenge for you? Apply now or contact us for more information.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Greenfield Company | Greenfield Project | Product Development | Java | Spring | AWS** 




  





 A Stockholm-based leader in digital innovation, this company focuses on developing solutions that streamline document management for businesses around the world. Their mission is to help organizations move away from outdated paper-based processes by offering secure, efficient, and sustainable digital alternatives. With a reputation for quality and a forward-thinking approach, the team is dedicated to delivering impactful results for their clients.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 This is a fantastic opportunity for a Senior Java Developer to take a leading role in building a new customer-facing portal. This platform will play a critical role in enhancing how customers interact with the company’s services.
 



 The role involves working with a modern tech stack, including Spring
 
 Boot, AWS, and Vue.js
 **,** 
 to deliver a scalable, intuitive, and high-performing application.
 



 As a senior developer, you’ll not only bring your technical expertise but also mentor team members and help shape the project’s technical direction.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities**



* Develop and maintain high-quality backend services using Java and Spring Boot.
* Collaborate closely with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration with the Vue.js-based user interface.
* Work with product managers and UX designers to translate business needs into effective technical solutions.
* Lead by example in promoting best practices for coding, testing, and performance optimization.
* Write and maintain unit and integration tests to ensure system reliability and performance.



  





**What You’ll Bring**



* Strong experience developing applications with Java and Spring Boot.
* Familiarity with modern frontend frameworks, particularly Vue.js, and the ability to collaborate effectively with frontend teams.
* Expertise in building and integrating RESTful APIs.
* A problem-solving mindset and the ability to troubleshoot complex issues in a dynamic environment.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with experience mentoring and guiding other developers.
* Bonus points for experience with DevOps tools, Docker, or Kubernetes.



  





**Why You Should Join**



* Be part of a project that’s central to the company’s growth and customer engagement strategy.
* Work with modern tools and technologies in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
* Collaborate with a talented and supportive team that values quality and creativity.
* Enjoy competitive compensation, a flexible working setup, and opportunities for personal and professional growth.
* Join a company that’s making a meaningful difference in digital transformation and sustainability.



  





 How to Apply
 



 If you’re an experienced Java developer with a passion for building cutting-edge applications and solving real-world problems, this is your chance to make a big impact. Apply today and take the next step in your career!

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Senior Fullstack Developer till Virki AB – Frihet, Utveckling och Spännande Projekt** 




  





**Om Virki** 




 På Virki sätter vi våra konsulter i fokus. Vi är ett konsultbolag med en stark företagskultur där vi tror på frihet, eget ansvar och ständig utveckling. Våra medarbetare är vår största tillgång, och vi strävar efter att skapa en arbetsmiljö där du kan växa både professionellt och personligen. Vi erbjuder spännande uppdrag hos våra kunder inom olika branscher, samtidigt som vi ger våra konsulter den support och frihet de behöver för att lyckas. Vi är övertygade om att det är möjligt att ha roligt på jobbet samtidigt som vi levererar högkvalitativ service och skapar värde för våra kunder.
 



  





**Om tjänsten:** 




 Som Fullstack Developer på Virki kommer du att arbeta med både frontend och backend i spännande projekt. Du kommer att arbeta nära våra kunder och andra teammedlemmar för att utveckla effektiva och skalbara lösningar.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Utveckla både frontend (JavaScript, TypeScript, React) och backend (Java).
* Bygg och integrera RESTful API:er.
* Arbeta med molnlösningar som AWS eller Azure.
* Samarbeta med kunder för att skapa effektiva lösningar.
* Agila arbetsprocesser.



  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Minst 6 års erfarenhet av fullstack-utveckling.
* Stark erfarenhet av JavaScript, TypeScript och React.
* Erfarenhet av backend-utveckling med Java och gärna Spring Boot.
* Erfarenhet av molnlösningar (AWS, Azure) och databaser (SQL/NoSQL).
* **Flytande svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.**



  





**Vi erbjuder:** 



* Frihet och Flexibilitet: Möjlighet att arbeta på distans eller från vårt kontor i Stockholm.
* Personlig utveckling: Stöd för att växa i din roll genom utbildningar och erfarenheter.
* Varierande projekt: Arbeta med olika kunder och teknologier.
* Konkurrenskraftig lön och förmåner.
* Arbetsmiljö: En inkluderande arbetsmiljö där vi värdesätter frihet och utveckling



  





  





 Ansök idag!
 



  





 Låter detta som en roll för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Har du frågor? Tveka inte att kontakta oss. 
 



  





 Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till vårt team på Virki!

title: Software Engineer
description:

**Job Description**
* Scrum ceremonies, Test Planning, estimation and Preparation
* Web/ App Testing (Andriod, IOS)
* Test Documentation, Test Case Execution, Defect Reporting and Tracking
* Automated Script creation & maintenance (Work with and set up automated testing to detect and alert tracking anomalies )
* Integration , SIT, E2E & Regression Testing, AB Testing
* Drive and collaborate the discussions with stakeholders.


**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Establishing Testing Process in team
* Expert in Web/App Testing (Andriod, IOS)
* Experince in Automation tool preferably Selenium with Java
* Knowledge of Testing Tools BrowserStack, JIRA, QMetry, Confluence,
* Good understanding of Testing Types , functional testing, regression testing, usability testing, and integration testing, & E2E testing etc
* Browser and Operating System Knowledge
* Critical Thinking and Analytical Skills, Understanding of JavaScript
* Take ownership of the QA processes and able to collaborate with stakeholders
* Good Understanding of APIs and Performance testing
* Knowledge of Agile/Scrum


**Required cloud certification** 
 : AZ900
   

  

**Application deadline:** 
 03-02-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Java Developer
description:
Conmore grundades 1991 och företagets fokus har alltid varit att erbjuda marknadsledande konsulttjänster med stor teknisk höjd. Idag arbetar Conmore som utvecklingspartner till ett flertal globala företag. Företagets huvudkontor finns i Mölndal utanför Göteborg, och Conmore har även kontor i både Linköping och i Stockholm. Totalt har företaget cirka 160 medarbetare. Sedan 2022 är vi en del av ASTEK Group. ASTEK är en global aktör inom ingenjörs- och teknikkonsultverksamhet, närvarande på fem kontinenter.
   

  

 We are looking for a Java Developer who will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining Java applications. The candidate will work closely with a development team to deliver high-quality software solutions.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain robust, scalable, and secure Java-based applications.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product owners, designers, and testers, to deliver high-quality software solutions.
* Lead technical discussions, provide mentorship to junior developers, and contribute to the continuous improvement of development practices.
* Ensure code quality through automated testing, code reviews, and adherence to best practices.
* Troubleshoot, debug and optimize existing applications to enhance performance and reliability.


**Qualifications**
* 3+ years of professional experience in Java development.
* Knowledge of Java programming language and object-oriented design principles.
* Experience with Spring Framework, Hibernate, and other Java frameworks/libraries.
* Fluency in Swedish and English (both written and spoken).
* Problem-solving and analytical skills
* Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
* Good communication and interpersonal skills.


**Nice To Have But Not Required**
* Knowledge of front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.


**Other**
*The assignment may be covered by defense secrecy, which means requirements for a certain citizenship and approval of a security clearance.*
**Who are we?**
 Conmore is a consulting company that highly prioritizes its employees. We provide exciting and challenging assignments and do our utmost in every situation in order to meet your desire for a matching position. To enhance and strengthen you as an individual all employees have their own development plan for individual growth. In order for everyone to develop further and thrive in their role as consultants, the group manager dedicates time for regular one-on-one meetings to listen and follow up on the work plan, and need for training, provide feedback, and more to make sure you are satisfied and in the right place.
   

  

 We are proud of our company’s unique community feeling and we highly value competence and a secure work environment which we believe contributes to a pleasant and motivating workplace. Besides professional activities such as training et cetera, we offer regular social activities which bring us together to have a good time and share knowledge and experiences in the group. Despite our constant willingness to grow as a company we still emphasize preserving our warm family feeling.
   

  

**In Conmore, We Have a Women's Network Called KICO**
 We aim to create a sense of security among our employees and to serve as a role model in the engineering industry through our women's network "Female Engineers at Conmore" (KICO). KICO is a network where we inspire, share experiences, and act as role models for each other.
   

  

 KICO usually organizes around 2-3 events per year to gather all women within the company to inspire, network, and exchange experiences with each other. We have representatives at all our offices.
   

  

 Link to KICO: https://conmore.se/karriar/kvinnliga-ingenjorer-kico/
   

  

 If you're interested in participating, you're always welcome to the events.
   

  

 Would you also like to be a part of our team?
   

  

 We are recruiting continuously, please don’t hesitate with your application and feel free to contact us if you have questions.
   

  

**Technical Recruiter and coordinator** 
 : Daniella Hernandez
   

  

 Mail: daniella.hernandez@conmore.se
   

  

 Phone: +46 70-624 0344
   

  

 Please note that due to GDPR, we will not accept applications via mail. Please use our career site.
   

  

 We are looking forward to hearing from you!

Coalesce Management Consultancy (CMC) has a consulting assignment available for a Software Engineer to work on-site on a project in Stockholm.
 



  





 We are seeking a skilled
 **Software Developer** 
 with experience in embedded systems within the transport industry. The role involves investigating the clients existing architecture, collaborating with teams, and designing innovative solutions. The candidate will focus on embedded software development for the architecture of the complex transport systems.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Investigate the architecture and identify system needs.

* Guide junior team members and contribute to embedded software development.

 If you have the relevant capability and are interested in pursuing this assignment, talk to our sales consultants today. oliver.adamson@cmcexpertisedelivered.com
 



  





 Get in touch

title: Lead System Developer
company_industry: Public Safety, Information Services, and Public Health
description:
*På SOS Alarm har vi ett viktigt uppdrag: att skapa trygghet för alla, dygnet runt, året om. Vi utvecklar smarta lösningar och tjänster som stärker samhällets förmåga att hantera kriser, olyckor och nödsituationer.* 




  





*Vill du arbeta i en nyckelroll där din tekniska kompetens gör konkret samhällsnytta?* 




*På SOS Alarm får du vara med och bygga robusta, pålitliga system som räddar liv. Vi söker nu en Systemarkitekt som vill vara med och utveckla våra viktiga Automatlarm.* 




  





  





  





**Din vardag hos oss** 




 Hos oss kommer du att ha en central och avgörande roll i vår tekniska miljö.
 



  





**I rollen kommer du bland annat att:** 




  




* Utveckla och vidareutveckla kod och arkitektur för våra samhällsviktiga kärnsystem, där robusthet och säkerhet är högsta prioritet.



  




* Omvandla verksamhetens krav till en tekniskt hållbar systemarkitektur och säkerställa att lösningarna möter såväl dagens som morgondagens behov.



  




* Stötta våra utvecklingsteam genom att skapa tydliga riktlinjer och best practices inom utveckling, integration och infrastruktur.



  




* Bistå med expertis kring integrationer, API:er och systeminfrastruktur i både Azure-molnmiljö och on-prem-lösningar.



  




* Samarbeta tätt med andra roller i teamet för att optimera vårt releaseförfarande och bidra till en smidig och stabil drift av våra system.



  





  





 Våra system byggs primärt i .NET/C# (backend) och Angular (Frontend/webb). Vi arbetar i Microsoftmiljöer, primärt med onpremlösningar men även Azure förekommer.
 



  





  





**Vad vi erbjuder dig:** 




  




* En arbetsmiljö där dina idéer och initiativ värdesätts.
* Goda möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
* Kollegor med ett stort engagemang och en stark laganda.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med samhällskritisk teknik som ständigt behöver finnas tillgänglig.
* En flexibel arbetsmiljö där du har möjlighet att arbeta i en hybridlösning - en kombination av arbete på vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm och på distans.



  





  





  





 DIN BAKGRUND
 



 Vi söker dig som både vill arbeta med kod och Systemarkitektur. Du är driven, målinriktad, gillar att samarbeta och sprida kunskaper till andra och du har en förmåga att förklara lösningar och få alla i teamet att jobba mot samma mål. Du är utvecklare i grunden och tycker om att jobba med kod men du vill även lyfta blicken och jobba med systemarkitektur.
 



  





  





**Kompetensmässigt söker vi dig som har:** 




  




* Fullstack: Goda kunskaper i C#/.Net
* Erfarenhet av Systemdesign
* Erfarenhet av integrations och/eller kommunikation. Telekomerfarenhet är också användbart.
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* Arbeta på Stockholmskontoret några dagar i veckan



  





  





 Hos oss är våra värderingar,
 **Professionella & Empatiska** 
 samt
 **Ansvarstagande & Samverkande** 
 , något som genomsyrar hela kulturen på SOS Alarm och att du kan relatera till dessa är en förutsättning för att trivas hos oss!
 



  





  





  





 MER OM OSS SOM ARBETSPLATS
 



 Vi på SOS Alarm arbetar för ett tryggare Sverige för alla. Det gör vi genom att hjälpa människor i nödsituationer, hantera larm, koordinera arbete vid olyckor och kriser, samt genom att aktivt bevaka händelser och trender på nationell och global nivå. Vi gör allt detta i samverkan med våra kunder och partners - dygnet runt, årets alla dagar. Många är framför allt bekanta med vår leverans av det nationella nödnumret 112, men vi erbjuder även ett växande antal innovativa tjänster för både den privata och offentliga marknaden.
 



  





 Vi sitter i fina lokaler centrala Stockholm.
 



  





  





 ANSÖKAN
 



 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med House of Skills.
 



 Har du frågor? Kontakta gärna Linda Mukka (linda.mukka@houseofskills.se) eller Linda Freij (linda.freij@houseofskills.se).
 



  





  





 Urval sker löpande, så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
 



*SOS Alarm genomför säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll på sin personal enligt kraven ur säkerhetsskyddslag (2018:585). Även en kontroll enligt Lag (1974:191) om bevakningsföretag utförs och är aktiv under anställningsperioden. Drogtest utan anmärkning är en förutsättning för anställning. Tjänsten innebär även krigsplacering vid SOS Alarm.*

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Angular Developer
description:
Role Description:
 



 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate should possess excellent communication and leadership skills, along with a strong background in Angular and Web Services. This role will involve both design and development responsibilities, with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions in a collaborative environment.
 



 Key Competencies:
 


* Angular 13+
* Web Services



 Experience Required:
 


* 10+ years of hands-on experience in Angular development.



 Essential Skills:
 


* Expertise in Design and Development in Angular.
* Deep knowledge of Angular practices and commonly used modules, based on extensive work experience.



 Desirable Skills:
 


* Ability to create self-contained, reusable, and testable modules and components in Angular.
* Experience in creating custom, general-use modules and components that extend the elements and modules of core Angular.



 Keywords:
 


* 8 to 10 Years’ Experience in Angular

title: Tech Lead Manager
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 You will act as both Tech Lead and Manager, in a perfect mix of leading people (Team of Developers) and developing code. Our aim is to consolidate the team of developers that you will lead in Stockholm. You will collaborate with your Product Partner, regarding planning and building the right products at the right time. You will be responsible for defining clear goals for your team and lead them in delivering on those goals.
   

  

 Apart from this, you are also responsible for setting salaries, helping individuals on your team grow and developing, as well as contributing technically to the team.
   

  

 As Tech Lead Manager you have a holistic perspective and the ability to inspire and lead others. You love working with tech and have experience working as a developer, working with code reviews, testing and quality assurance. You have at least one area where your team can rely on you making strong technical contributions.
   

  

* Communicate and collaborate with stakeholders
* Define quarterly goals and do weekly follow-ups
* Support and make sure the team members are the best they can be
* Develop and coach your team members individually
* Facilitate daily stand-ups and advise on agile WoW
* Contribute technically (wherever your strong area is) to the team


**Requirements**
* MSc/BS in computer science or similar degree
* Experience working as a Manager for a Tech Team
* Working in different contexts and organisations
* Interest in leadership and developing teams
* Proficient in English, both verbal and written
* Business minded and able to see the big picture
* A natural leader who is caring and inspiring
* Able to communicate clearly, both with your team and stakeholders
* Well organized and goal oriented


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Software Developer - Embedded Systems
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Do you thrive on seeing your ideas come to life? Welcome to our exciting and technology-driven world.
   

  

 Your Role
   

  

 This opportunity is for those passionate about developing cutting-edge software for embedded systems. You'll have the chance to grow your expertise in this field, working with state-of-the-art technology, signal processing, and algorithm development for next-generation Electronic Warfare products.
   

  

 You'll join a dynamic, cross-functional team taking ownership of complete functions from design through implementation and testing. This involves designing and implementing large-scale embedded systems where digital signal processing, algorithm development, and data distribution are crucial.
   

  

 As part of the software department, you'll join a competent team where we support each other and foster a positive work environment. Together with specialists in software development, FPGA, systems design, integration, and verification, you'll play a key role in developing our products, from design to functional testing.
   

  

 Your Profile
   

  

 You are an engaged and curious individual with a strong sense of responsibility and a desire to learn and understand. You share our passion for software development in embedded systems and prefer working collaboratively towards common goals.
   

  

 To be successful in this role, we believe you have experience in developing advanced functions and systems for embedded platforms. Experience with signal processing, System-on-chip architectures, C++, Python, Java, version control systems like GIT, and other software development practices is highly desirable. You also have a relevant technical university degree and communication skills in both Swedish and English.
   

  

 This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.
   

  

 What You'll Be Part Of
   

  

 Behind our innovations stand the people who make them possible. Brave pioneers and curious minds. Everyday heroes and inventive troubleshooters. Those who share deep knowledge and those who explore sky-high. And everyone in between.
   

  

 Joining us means making an impact together, contributing in our own unique ways. From crafting complex code and building impressive defence and security solutions to simply sharing a coffee with a colleague, every action counts. We encourage you to take on challenges, to create smart inventions and grow in our friendly and tech-savvy workspace. We have a solid mission to keep people and society safe.
   

  

 Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 24,500 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.
   

  

 Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here
   

  

 If you are interested in what benefits you can take part of as an employee at Saab in Sweden, you can read more about them here
   

  

 Do you want to get to know our business and our people a little bit better? Here you can find some stories told by our employees.
   

  

 Kindly observe that this is an ongoing recruitment process and that the position might be filled before the closing date of the advertisement.

title: System Architect
job_function: Information Technology and Health Care Provider
company_industry: Public Safety and Health and Human Services
description:
*På SOS Alarm har vi ett viktigt uppdrag: att skapa trygghet för alla, dygnet runt, året om. Vi utvecklar smarta lösningar och tjänster som stärker samhällets förmåga att hantera kriser, olyckor och nödsituationer.* 




  





*Vill du arbeta i en nyckelroll där din tekniska kompetens gör konkret samhällsnytta?* 




*På SOS Alarm får du vara med och bygga robusta, pålitliga system som räddar liv. Vi söker nu en Systemarkitekt som vill vara med och utveckla våra viktiga Automatlarm.* 




  





  





 DIN VARDAG SOM SYSTEMARKITEKT
 



 I denna roll kommer du att tillhöra vårt agila Produktteam Automatlarm där vi arbetar med den tekniska plattformen för mottagning av automatiska larm, alltifrån brandlarm till trygghetslarm och personlarm, in till vår larmcentral. Det hjälper oss att tillsammans rädda liv dygnet runt, året om och göra Sverige tryggare för alla.
 



  





  





 Som Systemarkitekt ansvarar du för våra mjukvarulösningar. Utifrån ställda krav tar du fram lösningsdesign och systemdesign, är med och utvecklar och förbereder för att gå live. Detta ger dig en teknikledande roll i teamet där du tar ansvar för systemövergripande frågor i det dagliga arbetet. Det involverar även förståelse för, och kontakter med omkringliggande system och team. Du säkerställer att vi gör kloka val kring systemens uppbyggnad och drivs av att vilja leverera värde för våra användare, samtidigt som du väger in andra faktorer såsom förvaltningsbarhet och säkerhet. I roller kommer du till viss del även arbeta med backendutveckling när behov uppstår.
 



  





  





 Våra system byggs primärt i .NET/C# (backend) och Angular (Frontend/webb). Vi arbetar i Microsoftmiljöer, primärt med onpremlösningar men även Azure förekommer. Arbetsmetodiken är scrum med Jira som planeringsverktyg. En fast del av utvecklingsteamets arbetstid är avsatt till egen kompetensutveckling och innovation med särskilt inplanerade dagar för detta i slutet av varje sprint.
 



  





  





 DIN BAKGRUND
 



 Vi söker dig som brinner för Systemarkitektur, du är driven, målinriktad, gillar att samarbeta och sprida kunskaper till andra och du har en förmåga att förklara lösningar och få alla i teamet att jobba mot samma mål. Du är utvecklare i grunden och tycker om att jobba med kod men du vill även lyfta blicken och jobba med systemarkitektur. Rollen passar dig som är Lead Developer eller liknande och du vill ta en Systemarkitekturansvar eller så arbetar du i en Systemarkitektroll idag och vill komma in med din kompetens till SOS Alarm i denna nyckelroll.
 



  





  





**Kompetensmässigt söker vi dig som har:** 



* Fullstack: Goda kunskaper i C#/.Net och kunskaper även inom Frontendutveckling
* Erfarenhet av Systemdesign
* Erfarenhet av datakommunikation (gärna protokollkonvertering) i någon form, telekomerfarenhet är också användbart
* Git
* AzureDevOps
* Jira



  





  





 Hos oss är våra värderingar,
 **Professionella & Empatiska** 
 samt
 **Ansvarstagande & Samverkande** 
 , något som genomsyrar hela kulturen på SOS Alarm och att du kan relatera till dessa är en förutsättning för att trivas hos oss!
 



  





  





  





 MER OM OSS SOM ARBETSPLATS
 



 Vi på SOS Alarm arbetar för ett tryggare Sverige för alla. Det gör vi genom att hjälpa människor i nödsituationer, hantera larm, koordinera arbete vid olyckor och kriser, samt genom att aktivt bevaka händelser och trender på nationell och global nivå. Vi gör allt detta i samverkan med våra kunder och partners - dygnet runt, årets alla dagar. Många är framför allt bekanta med vår leverans av det nationella nödnumret 112, men vi erbjuder även ett växande antal innovativa tjänster för både den privata och offentliga marknaden.
 



  





 Vi sitter i fina lokaler centrala Stockholm.
 



  





  





 ANSÖKAN
 



 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med House of Skills.
 



 Har du frågor? Kontakta gärna Linda Mukka (linda.mukka@houseofskills.se) eller Linda Freij (linda.freij@houseofskills.se).
 



  





  





 Urval sker löpande, så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
 



*SOS Alarm genomför säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll på sin personal enligt kraven ur säkerhetsskyddslag (2018:585). Även en kontroll enligt Lag (1974:191) om bevakningsföretag utförs och är aktiv under anställningsperioden. Drogtest utan anmärkning är en förutsättning för anställning. Tjänsten innebär även krigsplacering vid SOS Alarm.*

title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
description:
Vi söker en erfaren mjukvaruutvecklare med expertis inom inbyggda system för att stödja utvecklingen av en produkt som kör ett målsystem byggt på ESP32 och ESP-IDF, med en utvecklingsmiljö som använder en dev-container baserad på Linux. Vi behöver en konsult som kan bidra med sin tekniska kompetens för att vidareutveckla och optimera vår lösning.
   

  

**Krav**
 – Erfarenhet av IoT och uppkopplingstekniker som LTE, Wi-Fi, BLE, GNSS/GPS samt AWS IoT
   

  

 – Gedigen kunskap i C/C++ för inbyggda system
   

  

 – Goda färdigheter i Linux- och Windows-baserade utvecklingsmiljöer
   

  

 – Erfarenhet av kommunikationsprotokoll inom inbyggda system, inklusive UART, I2C, SPI, CAN och Modbus
   

  

 – Erfarenhet av utvecklingsverktyg som Jira, Git/GitLab samt testframeworks för enhets- och systemtester
   

  

 – Kunskap i Python för testautomatisering
   

  

 – Flytande engelska i tal och skrift.
   

  

 – Goda kunskaper i svenska är meriterande
   

  

**Omfattning:** 
 100%
   

  

**Start:** 
 Asap (kunden kan vänta 30 dagar på rätt person)
   

  

**Längd:** 
 6 månader
   

  

**Ort:** 
 Stockholm

title: Engineering Manager
description:
*Global migration is a 21st-century reality: Whether people are fleeing from something or racing towards better opportunity, finding love, or looking to experience new cultures, people are now living side by side in a new way. At Rebtel, we believe in tearing down borders – from the geographical borders that complicate international communication and money transfers to the cultural borders that keep people divided. We’re on a mission to build products serving the 2 billion modern internationals of the world. We offer work, communication, and remittance services for anyone that has crossed a border:*
*Our team mirrors our global audience: we are a diverse team of :50 people from 27 different countries that get together everyday – and we’d love for you to join us. Do you have what it takes?*
**Rebtel is looking for an Engineering Manager**
**About Rebtel's Development Teams**
 Our users know us for our best-in-class calling, smooth money transfer and best-value topup services. These services are powered by our core systems that are engineered to deliver processing efficiency. You will be the engineering manager for the team that builds and maintains these core services.
   

  

 Our mobile apps have more than 10M downloads across App Store and Play Store, and our website is visited by millions of users. Our core services easily support these kinds of loads given the considerations that have gone into load balancing, distributed processing and high availability. The core engineering team builds for scale and for a global audience, making ours a setup that offers exciting challenges and a chance to work with cutting edge technologies.
   

  

 The engineering manager’s responsibility, in a nutshell, is to ensure that we have the right people, working on the right things, using the right tools and processes. The core team is cross-functional - you will have mobile developers, .Net developers and Web developers working with you.
   

  

**About You And Your Responsibilities**
* Provide leadership of the core engineering team on a daily basis
* Align the frontend strategy with the interim and long-term visions of Rebtel
* Interface with the product team to translate product needs into deliverables from the Frontend team
* Help us to retain, develop and attract top engineering talent
* You have keen interest in architecture: how to build complex applications that are maintainable.
* As an engineering manager your role will include having an overview of architectural decisions. You will discuss technical solutions with the rest of the team and institute measures to keep the code base clean.
* You are interested in problem solving and enjoy finding the simplest possible solution to complex problems.


**Requirements**
* Experience building and leading software development teams
* Sound knowledge in Agile development methodologies
* Experience with Development lifecycle tools and processes (Github, Jira, Confluence)
* Experience in a high-volume environment or product with millions of users.
* Ability to adapt and respond to rapidly evolving product needs
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. We work in English, but you will be able to have conversations in 20+ languages


**Bonus points**
* You have developer experience with one of backend, full-stack, Mobile or Web but have a solid understanding of the other areas.
* Experience working with large teams on mature products with many users
* Experience building new products with an eye on maintainability and scalability
* Experience in one of the sectors in which we work i.e payment platforms, FinTech, telecoms or money transfer
* You can bake, ski, play a musical instrument or spend > 2 hours in a Friday afterwork


**What's in it for you?**
* A chance to leave your mark on one of few global products out of Stockholm
* Work with cool new shiny tech
* A chance to work with a fun and very diverse team


*We are Rebtel. People from all around the world, as of now 27 countries and more to come. We believe in equal opportunity and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.*

title: Senior SQL/C# Developer | SEB, Solna
description:
Would you like to join an innovative team of highly skilled employees in a fast-paced agile environment where time-to-market and quality are essential?
   

  

 We are looking for a SQL and C# Developer to join our Trading Regulatory Reporting Team in Stockholm within SEB’s Technology area. The team already consists of dedicated persons who are delivering regulatory reporting for SEB and its clients. We work based in Stockholm & Riga as a large virtual team using agile methodologies. And we are now looking for a SQL/C# Developer to be part of one of our agile teams and working on shaping our applications for the future.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Regulatory Reporting has been an important part of the financial services industry during the last 10 years, and, to adapt to all market changes. The application we use today is an in-house built reporting engine built on Microsoft platform that delivers key information to regulators to keep SEB compliant throughout its Trading services.
   

  

 You will be based in Stockholm and work in an international and friendly environment in close cooperation with different teams in Sweden, Latvia and other countries. We see you as a candidate that can play an important role in our SAFe agile team, working on transforming, developing and maintaining our applications.
   

  

 We highly value your personality. As our new colleagues, we believe you are motivated and self-driven, with the ability easily to instill confidence and collaborate with the rest of us. On the job training will be provided through our onboarding and mentoring program to build your career and expertise within SEB and our trading product solutions. We expect you to have great ability to work in a diverse team.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, we believe you have:**
* Deep knowledge within MS SQL and C# .Net
* A bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent
* Experience of large administrative systems with many integrations, built on Microsoft platform
* Experience of system design
* Experience from Git, GitHub and Azure DevOps
* Experience from message-oriented middleware (MOM)
* A coaching mindset and are ready to share knowledge with the rest of the team
* We also believe you are enjoying the Agile way of working


**It is meritorious if you have:**
* Experience of developing cloud applications
* Experience with parallel and concurrent programming (message passing paradigm)
* Experience of integration data design
* Experience from working in a bank with reporting applications


**What we offer:**
* Agile and modern ways of working
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* An innovative company in the forefront of technology


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued. Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than18 -02-2025. If you have questions about the position, please contact Hiring Manager Nicklas Svanehav at Nicklas.svanehav @seb.se.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 www.sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Fullstack-utvecklare
description:
Valtech söker en erfaren Fullstack-utvecklare till vårt dynamiska team i Stockholm. Har du erfarenhet av .NET och React och vill vara med och skapa innovativa, skalbara lösningar? Då är detta rollen för dig! Ansök idag och bli en del av vårt kreativa och växande team.
 



  





**Om rollen:** 




  





 Som Fullstack-utvecklare hos Valtech får du en central roll där du både fungerar som teknisk rådgivare och praktisk utvecklare. Du kommer att vara involverad i hela projektets livscykel – från discovery till leverans. I rollen arbetar du nära både interna team och våra kunder för att skapa lösningar som gör verklig skillnad.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter:** 




  





 · Agera som pålitlig rådgivare för våra kunder och bidra till att hitta tekniska lösningar som matchar deras affärsbehov.
 



 · Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att designa och implementera fullstacklösningar.
 



 · Delta i workshops, kundmöten och presentationer för att säkerställa att projekten genomförs effektivt och transparent.
 



 · Ständigt bidra till förbättring av våra utvecklingsmetoder och processer.
 



 Om dig:
 



 Vi söker en Fullstack-utvecklare med cirka 5 års erfarenhet och ett genuint intresse för att utveckla både front-end och back-end lösningar. Du är en lagspelare som trivs i samarbete och har förmågan att översätta affärsbehov till hållbara tekniska lösningar.
 



  





**Dina kvalifikationer:** 




  





 · Cirka 5 års erfarenhet av fullstack-utveckling.
 



 · God erfarenhet av teknologier som .NET Core, C#, React, TypeScript, Vue, Node.js och GraphQL.
 



 · Förmåga att arbeta med API-integrationer och CMS-teknologier (t.ex. headless CMS).
 



 · Erfarenhet av att arbeta i agila miljöer med verktyg som Jira och Confluence.
 



 · Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
 



 · Du har också möjlighet att arbeta på plats i Stockholmsområdet.
 



 Bonus om du har erfarenhet av:
 



 · Angular, Ruby on Rails, eller CMS/e-handelsplattformar som Sitecore, Optimizely och Adobe.
 



 · Erfarenhet av molnplattformar som Azure eller AWS.
 



  





**Vad vi erbjuder:** 




  





 På Valtech får du arbeta med några av de mest innovativa projekten och kunderna. Vi erbjuder en inkluderande och stimulerande arbetsmiljö där kreativitet och teknisk utveckling går hand i hand. Här får du möjlighet att växa tillsammans med företaget och ta ansvar för spännande utmaningar.
 



  





**Valtechs kultur:** 




  





 Vår kultur präglas av våra värderingar: Share, Care, Dare. Vi tror på samarbete, omtanke och mod att ta initiativ. Här får du möjlighet att arbeta tillsammans med passionerade kollegor som strävar efter att skapa de bästa lösningarna för våra kunder. Vi lägger stor vikt vid att ha roligt och att utvecklas tillsammans.
 



  





**Vill du vara med på vår resa?** 




  





 Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och vill vara en del av vår framgångsresa, ansök idag! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig.

title: SharePoint Developer
description:
Are you a skilled SharePoint Developer looking to join a dynamic and growing IT consulting company? At Sii Sweden, we are seeking a talented developer to join our team and contribute to exciting projects with leading companies in various industries.
   

  

 We are dedicated to supporting the development of our employees. This is why we have a broad training and mentoring offer and other benefits like a pension plan, insurance, wellness package, regular AW, and more. Apply to find out!
   

  

**Your tasks**
* Design, develop, and implement SharePoint solutions based on client needs
* Customize SharePoint sites, applications, and workflows
* Integrate SharePoint with other Microsoft technologies, e.g., Microsoft 365, Teams, Power Platform
* Troubleshoot and resolve SharePoint-related issues and optimize performance
* Collaborate with clients and internal teams to gather requirements and deliver high-quality solutions


**Requirements**
* Work experience as a SharePoint Developer
* Strong knowledge of SharePoint Online, SharePoint 2013/2016/2019, and Microsoft 365
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C#, .NET, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and PowerShell
* Previous experience with SPFx and building custom web parts
* Familiarity with Power Platform and integrations with SharePoint
* Expertise with migration projects
* Proficiency in English


 Nice to have
   

  

* Knowledge of SQL Server, REST API, and Azure Services
* Experience with Microsoft Azure DevOps for CI/CD
* Understanding of governance, compliance, and security best practices within SharePoint environments
* Proficiency in Swedish is a big plus


 Job no. 250102-N0VNC

title: Embedded Software Engineer
company_industry: Biotechnology Research, Research Services, and Pharmaceutical Manufacturing
description:
**As a Senior Embedded System Engineer, the candidate will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and optimizing embedded systems and firmware for Perten instruments.** 
 The ideal candidate should possess a strong technical background in embedded systems. Proficiency in C and C++ is essential, while knowledge of Python and C# is a plus. Experience in Linux application development and low-level hardware interaction is highly desirable. As part of our team, you will contribute to challenging projects that leverage the latest technologies in the field. You will collaborate with electronic, mechanical, and design engineers to develop new products from concept to completion. The role demands independence, responsibility, and active participation in achieving shared team goals.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and debug firmware for embedded devices and systems.
* Write efficient and optimized low-level code in C, C++.
* Develop and maintain hardware drivers for peripherals like GPIO, UART, SPI, I2C, and ADC/DAC.
* Develop and maintain firmware for microcontrollers, SoCs, and other embedded platforms.
* Collaborate with hardware teams to define system architecture and hardware requirements.
* Expert-level knowledge of embedded Linux systems, application development on Linux.
* Software development: Write and debug low-level code for hardware drivers and system control.
* Implement and debug communication protocols (e.g., SPI, I2C, UART, CAN, Ethernet).
* Testing and validation: Perform system-level testing, debugging, and validation to ensure reliability and performance. Conduct root cause analysis of firmware-related issues and implement fixes.
* Create and execute test plans for firmware and hardware validation.
* Use tools like oscilloscopes, logic analyzers, and JTAG debuggers for troubleshooting.
* Document system designs, specifications, and processes for internal and external stakeholders.
* Support manufacturing and field teams in resolving technical issues.
* Strong problem-solving, debugging & Analytical skills.


**Basic Qualifications**
* Master’s degree in electrical engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
* Experience: 5+ years of hands-on experience in embedded systems development
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C, C++, and Python
* Strong understanding of microcontrollers, microprocessors, and SoCs (e.g., ARM Cortex, Altera, PIC)
* Knowledge of communication protocols (SPI, I2C, UART, CAN, USB)
* Experience with Embedded Linux application development.
* Knowledge of power management, memory optimization, and real-time constraints.
* Experience in low-level driver development and board bring-up.
* Understanding of bootloaders, and memory management


**Preferred Characteristics**
* Experience with embedded application development on ARM microcontrollers.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Familiarity with the software development lifecycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies.
* Knowledge of secure firmware development, including cryptographic protocols and secure boot.
* Hands-on experience with Raspberry Pi Compute Module development.
* A creative mindset with a top-down approach to solution design.
* Strong problem-solving, debugging, and analytical skills.

title: Senior Pega Developer
description:
Must-Have Skills:
 


* 6+ years of software development experience, with a strong background in Pega development.
* Proven ability to implement business rules and build low-level design (LLD).
* Extensive experience with integrations, including SOAP services.
* Practical knowledge and experience working in Agile methodologies.
* Proficiency in XML, Java, and SQL.
* Strong understanding and practical experience with PEGA Guardrails.
* Ability to work at a broad technical level across all phases of the application systems project lifecycle.
* Application of business knowledge and technical skills in system development.
* Experience with working on PRPC with Oracle databases and application servers like WebSphere/WebLogic.
* Experience with performance tuning, performance analysis, log analysis, and defect fixing.



 Good-to-Have Skills:
 


* Excellent communication skills and the ability to interact effectively across all organizational levels.
* Experience in client handling, including managing and understanding client needs.
* Demonstrated capability in onsite-offshore coordination.
* Understanding of enterprise architecture, with knowledge of key value drivers.
* Collaboration experience with developers, business analysts, QA, and other stakeholders.
* A strong team player with a positive attitude and adaptability to new technologies.



 Background:
 


* Engineering Graduate/Post-Graduate in any discipline (Computer Science preferred) or MCA.
* A solid foundation in software development and technical architecture.



 Responsibilities/Expectations from the Role:
 


1. Work on Pega PRPC with Oracle databases and application servers (WebSphere/WebLogic).
2. Engage in requirement gathering, design class structures and flows, conduct code reviews, and manage a knowledge repository.
3. Perform performance tuning, analyze performance metrics, review logs, and fix defects.
4. Work with MQ, SOAP/EJB services for integrations and other application communication protocols.



 Additional Expectations:
 


* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Contribute to the success of agile projects by following processes, delivering quality code, and adhering to deadlines.
* Share knowledge, mentor junior team members, and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.

title: Head of Impact & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**This ad is not for an employment, but an opportunity to build a VC-backed startup from the ground up.** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished professional with a demonstrated track record in advancing sustainability initiatives. Your expertise lies within critical areas like renewable energy, food security, or the blue economy. Driven by a passion for positive change, you envision building a groundbreaking tech startup that disrupts the status quo and propels sustainability solutions forward.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success!



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**Ideal Candidate Profile** 



* **Domain Expertise:** 
 Possess in-depth knowledge of sustainability sectors like renewable energy, waste management, or the blue economy. You're passionate about building scalable solutions for a greener future.
* **Problem-solving Prowess:** 
 Derive satisfaction from developing innovative products that address real-world challenges.
* **Impact Driven:** 
 Fuel a burning desire to make a positive difference for both people and the planet.
* **Optional:** 
 Arrive equipped with a nascent business idea focused on a specific problem, solution, or technology.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Meet Our Nordic Success Stories:** 



* **Wingbits:** 
 Community-driven flight data; redefining air travel efficiency.
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture

title: Insurance Practitioners to Guidewire Engagements
description:
**Location: Sweden, Stockholm**
 This is an extraordinary opportunity to build a rewarding career within Financial Services. Working in highly collaborative teams for world-leading clients, we will nurture your talent in an inclusive culture that values diversity.
   

  

 Our vision at Accenture Financial Services is to help financial institutions change to become more agile, digital and human. We create value for our clients by applying innovation and industry expertise at the intersection of business and technology.
   

  

**Description Of Role And Practice**
 We are looking for specifiers, developers, testers, project managers to help leading insurance companies to shape their digital strategy and business transformation and help them on their journey to grow their business and stay relevant for their customers. As part of the team, you will be working for some of the biggest financial institutions in the Nordics with a variety of project opportunities such as business transformation, digitalization, data and analytics and process design.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
- Be engaged in various projects with a wide range of topics: specification, development, testing, project management

- Develop, define, and implement strategies to help our clients solve their most critical problems within insurance, such as digital transformations, process governance and regulatory requirements

- As a specifier your task is to define the insurance processes and functionalities to be implemented on the Guidewire platform together with our customers' business

- As a developer or architect your task is the technical planning and implementation on top of the Guidewire platform

- A tester your task is to ensure the correct functionality of the solutions implemented on the Guidewire platform

- As a project manager your task is to lead large guidewire implementation projects

- Analyze and conceptualize business models, processes, and digital solutions

- Engage with the broader Accenture Financial Services community, as well as other Accenture organization groups to foster collaboration and support growth and development of the business and bring the best of Accenture to our clients

**Job Requirements**
 We expect you to have at least a couple of years of experience from a position within an insurance company. We would also like to see that you have:
   

  

  

- Solid experience in Guidewire platform

- Passion and drive to work with the Financial Services industry

- Good analytical and problem-solving skills

- Project management experience from Business or IT related change projects

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in Swedish and English

- Entrepreneurial attitude, and good interpersonal skills

- Master´s degree (with major in Economics or similar) or equivalent with excellent academic results

**What We Offer**
- The opportunity to become part of the Technology Financial Services team working for the biggest insurers in Sweden and the Nordics

- Collaboration with a Nordic network of talented, passionate colleagues and experts within your field of interest

- Mentoring and continuous evaluation that ensure your career continues to progress

- Great opportunity to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills

- Early leadership roles and opportunity to drive initiatives you are passionate about

- Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization

- Extensive education programs and development opportunities

- Volunteering opportunities locally and around the world

- A diverse and socially active workforce

- Benefit package with competitive salary, bonus, pension, health insurance, employee stock purchase program and other benefits

- Flexible work arrangements for maintaining work-life balance

**Apply now**
 We look forward to receiving your application. Apply online. Remember to attach CV and cover letter.
