* Generöst friskvårdsbidrag på 5 000 kr/år.
* Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring och tjänstepension.
* Spännande uppdrag hos kunder som Klarna, DNB, Tieto och Telenor.
* Ett jämt fördelat team med 50 % tjejer och killar från olika bakgrunder.
* En inkluderande företagskultur med högt i tak ich där alla röster räknas.

title: Head of Operations Nordics
Senior Enterprise Risk Manager
description:
A Unique opportunity to join the leading company in the Nordics and help drive the electrification and decarbonisation agenda while contributing to the success of Fortum. You thrive in being a supporting partner for the business, all while developing Risk management core governance principles. Here you will be offered a challenging job where you utilize your risk management skills all while developing your knowledge and expertise in a wide range of business categories spanning several geographical regions.
   

  

**About The Role**
 In this role, you will be responsible for assessing and consolidating risks and providing visibility to risk exposure status for management teams and different committees including Fortum Leadership Team and Audit and risk Committee. You will also be responsible for providing risk disclosures in both internal and external reporting. Part of the role is to support in creating a sophisticated scenario analysis framework to support the ERM process related to the Key Risks of Fortum and its’ strategy. In this role you participate in developing Fortum’s business continuity management processes, and supporting business and enabling functions in creating and testing continuity plans. Enterprise Risk Manager is continuously actively supporting in developing methods and processes to improve risk awareness and risk-informed decision- making. Effective collaboration with managers and specialists at all levels of the organization is a key to succeeding in this role.
   

  

**About You**
 We’re looking for someone who is proactive, capable of working both independently and in leading role, and eager to actively seek out learning and development opportunities. You thrive on solving problems and feel comfortable to work with business development on a strategic as well as an operational, hands-on level.
   

  

 Experience & Education
   

  

  

* At least 5 years’ of relevant experience of risk management from the energy, utility, industrial or insurance sector
* We think you to have an university degree in for example Finance, Engineering, Economics or Legal
* Experience from insurance management and business continuity management of large corporation are considered as merit.


 Knowledge & skill
   

  

  

* Strong organizational, project management, problem-solving skills and co-operational mind-set
* Good written and oral presentation skills in English. Finnish and/or Swedish language skills are beneficial and considered as a merit


 In the role you will be required to analyse and interpret large amount of complex information and be able to draw conclusions and present recommendations to management for decision-making. A certain amount of travelling will be required, mainly to countries where Fortum has operations. We expect you to bring a hands-on attitude which in action means taking responsibility, working transparently, bringing your own ideas to the shared table and getting things done. Your self-leadership, curiosity, drive to learn and proactive way of working are highly valued.
   

  

**We offer you**
 At Fortum, we believe in a better future and want to be involved in shaping it. Our workplace is a safe place, both physically and mentally. You will grow with professional colleagues, being trusted and free to challenge yourself. We offer comprehensive benefits, flexible working hours, and hybrid work model to support your productivity, development and wellbeing. We are committed to build diverse teams where everyone feels included and is treated equally.
   

  

 More information about our culture and benefits can be found here.
   

  

**Interested?**
 Submit your application and CV by 02.02.2025 at the latest. In this recruitment, we have ongoing selection, which means that we call for interviews on an ongoing basis. If you would like to hear more about the position, please contact Tiia Mukkala, Director, Enterprise Risk Management and Insurances tiia.mukkala@fortum.com.
   

  

 To be selected for the position, the applicant must go through background clearance and a health examination, including drug testing.
   

  

**We are Fortum**
 Fortum is a Nordic energy company. Our purpose is to power a world where people, businesses and nature thrive together. We are one of the cleanest energy producers in Europe and our actions are guided by our ambitious environmental targets. We generate and deliver clean energy reliably and help industries to decarbonise their processes and grow. Our core operations in the Nordics comprise of efficient, CO2-free power generation as well as reliable supply of electricity and district heat to private and business customers. For our :5 000 employees, we commit to be a safe, and inspiring workplace. Fortum's share is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki. fortum.com

title: Head of Project Development, Solar
description:
Seize the opportunity to join a rapidly growing business and take on a position with great responsibility and possibility to influence further growth – both ours and yours. We are now looking for a Head of Project Development within Solar to our business in Sweden.
   

  

 Fortum’s Wind and Solar business area is responsible for the development of wind and solar business. Our aim is to grow especially in our home market where conditions for solar power are promising. Wind and solar power play a crucial role in decarbonization of our societies.
   

  

 The role will also involve you in the development of hybrid projects where we combine wind, solar, battery energy storage (BESS) and other renewable energy sources.
   

  

 The location for this position is flexible and can be in any region of Sweden. We have offices for example in Stockholm, Östersund, Göteborg, Karlstad and Malmö.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As Head of Development for our Solar Project Development department, you will lead and oversee all aspects of our solar power projects, from concept to realization. You will work closely with our technical team, external partners and government agencies to ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget and to the highest quality standards.
   

  

 In the role as Head of Development, the following is part of your key responsibilities:
   

  

  

* Lead and develop the solar project development team
* Develop and implement project development strategies
* Ensure that all projects comply with applicable laws and regulations
* Build and maintain relationships with stakeholders, including government agencies, suppliers and local communities
* Monitor project budgets and schedules
* Identify and manage risks and resolve any issues that arise during the course of projects.


 The Fortum organization has key experts in each area of Wind and Solar (engineering, construction, operation), as well as more business-related experts (procurement, offtake, and strategy) to support you in your work.
   

  

 You will be reporting to the Head of Development Sweden.
   

  

**About You**
 To be successful in the role as Head of Development, we see that you bring the following competences:
   

  

  

* A university degree in a relevant field, such as engineering, economics, or business administration
* Several years of experience in project management in solar power or other renewable energy
* Proven experience in leading and developing teams
* Strong understanding of technical, financial and regulatory aspects of solar energy projects
* Excellent communication and leadership skills together with strong negotiating skills
* Ability to work independently and make decisions under pressure
* Strong understanding in wind power business
* Fluency in Swedish and English is essential


**We offer you**
 Fortum Wind & Solar is embarking on an exciting growth journey. The greatest challenge of our time awaits you. To drive the change for a cleaner world, we need to reshape the energy system and we want you to be part of it. To reach our goals, we embrace a culture of openness, with mutual trust, believing in people, and taking care of everyone's wellbeing, we can reach even better results. Flexibility is the new normal and we apply a hybrid way of working wherever possible.
   

  

 You will have first row seats to the renewables market and its dynamics through the vantage point of one of the largest energy companies in the Nordics. You will be a part of a tightly linked team and unit, that values a safe and friendly working environment, where wellbeing is emphasized. You will have the possibility to challenge yourself, to develop and learn new skills and expertise by collaborating with top experts while also bringing your own experience to the table, and to form personal connections with wonderful people.
   

  

 More information about our culture and benefits can be found here.
   

  

**Interested?**
 Submit your application latest on 1st of March. We start contacting suitable candidates already during the application period. If you have questions and would like to hear more about the position, please contact Hiring Manager Karl-Johan Hellblom at karl-johan.hellblom@fortum.com or Recruitment Partner Lisa Kylberg at lisa.kylberg@partners.fortum.com.
   

  

 Contact details to union representatives can be found on the bottom of
 **this page.**
**We are Fortum**
 Fortum is a Nordic energy company. Our purpose is to power a world where people, businesses and nature thrive together. We are one of the cleanest energy producers in Europe and our actions are guided by our ambitious environmental targets. We generate and deliver clean energy reliably and help industries to decarbonise their processes and grow. Our core operations in the Nordics comprise of efficient, CO2-free power generation as well as reliable supply of electricity and district heat to private and business customers. For our :5 000 employees, we commit to be a safe, and inspiring workplace. Fortum's share is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki. fortum.com

title: Head of Group Sustainability - temp role
description:
In less than two hours, the sun delivers more energy to the Earth than we use in an entire year. Clean, limitless energy. When we come together to unleash that power, it will change everything. Because alone we can only do little, but together we can do so much. We will transfer power from the old and tired electricity giants and put it in our own hands. Together we will pave the way for an energy revolution, ridding the planet of fossil fuels and leading us into a sustainable future.
   

  

 As our star and Head of Group Sustainability, Malin Cronqvist, will be going on maternity leave, we are looking for someone who wants to lead and drive our sustainability work forward from mid-April for approximately 1 year.
   

  

**The role**
 As Head of Group Sustainability you will be overall responsible for the implementation of Svea Solar’s sustainability strategy. You will ensure that initiatives are successfully rolled out across the organization, that progress is made in prioritized areas and strategic objectives are met. You will be the primary contact point and spokesperson regarding sustainability externally and assist with expertise in key dialogues with customers, partners, investors, etc. The role also mean you are the internal expert on sustainability matters in general while each function and market are responsible for issues related to their specific area of work.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Sustainability Strategy - Ensure implementation & follow up of progress of strategic goals and roadmaps by supporting goal owners and related functions with expertise.
* Sustainability Reporting - Your most important mission during 2025/2026. Ensure that the annual sustainability report for 2025 complies with CSRD and meets our ambitions. This includes among other things to proactively structure and compile comprehensive ESG data from all markets, calculate necessary KPIs, structure and write the actual report, etc. A large focus will be on improving Svea Solar's climate data to prepare for setting a net zero road map in the future.
* Support Global Procurement with Supply Chain Due Diligence - implement plan for 2025 made by Head of Procurement & Head of Group Sustainability
* External sustainability representation towards stakeholders - Represent Svea Solar in meetings with potential and existing customers, commercial partners, investors, banks and other stakeholders. Use sustainability as a way to strengthen our external relationships.
* Internal capacity building & expertise - Serve as internal sustainability expert for all functions and markets providing guidance and input on processes, decisions, etc.
* ESG compliance & governance - Help ensure compliance and governance in terms of policies and routines related to sustainability.


**Are we a match?**
 To succeed and thrive in this role, we believe that...
   

  

* You have an academic background in sustainability, economics, or a similar field. You have several years of experience in sustainability reporting, ESG analysis, or similar areas. Furthermore, you are well-versed in and proficient with CSRD and other sustainability standards.
* You are not afraid of challenges and driving complex projects across functions. At Svea Solar there is still a lot of work to do when it comes establishing new processes, data structures, building internal knowledge, etc. Grit is a trait you must have!
* You like working with a lot of different functions both blue & white collars, topics and people. This role is broad, you will not get bored but need to be able to manage a lot of stakeholders and different issues at the same time. You will like it if you are curious and not afraid to take initiatives.
* You have broad and holistic understanding of how sustainability and traditional business values correlate and sometimes collide. We believe strongly in aligning profitability with sustainability and building business value along with improved sustainability practices. Managing these different perspectives to create the best compromise is crucial.


 Experience in the solar industry is a bonus, but not required. What matters most is a genuine interest in renewable energy and a passion for making a positive impact on our planet. 😊
   

  

**Svea Solar – More Than Just Solar Panels**
 Svea Solar is not only a leader in solar panel installations, but we also aim to be a long-term energy partner for our customers. We offer a broad product portfolio with smart solutions that enable our customers to optimize their energy usage. Our offerings include heat pumps in collaboration with IKEA, electric vehicle chargers, batteries, electricity contracts, and our own energy optimization software (VPP). We are continuously working to develop new solutions that make a difference — both for our customers and for the climate.

title: Systemspecialist till Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset
description:
*Vill du jobba med IT som räddar liv? Som systemspecialist på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset får du en central roll i att säkerställa driften och utvecklingen av laboratoriets IT-system. Här blir du en del av ett kunnigt team där din tekniska expertis verkligen gör skillnad!*
**Du erbjuds**
* att bli en del av ett härligt team med unik spetskompetens där vår gemensamma arbetsmiljö är mycket viktig
* möjlighet att vara med och påverka samt engagera dig i verksamhetens utveckling
* ett delaktigt och närvarande ledarskap där vi ser varje individ och strävar efter att du får de bästa förutsättningarna för din fortsatta professionella utveckling


 Självklart får du också ta del av våra generella förmåner som Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset erbjuder dig.
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Systemförvaltning Lab inom Karolinska IT har verksamhetens uppdrag att förvalta och utveckla laboratoriets IT-system och att ge användarstöd till laboratoriets användare. Enheten består av cirka 28 medarbetare fördelade på två sektioner, geografiskt placerade i Solna och i Huddinge. Karolinska Universitetslaboratoriet är en ackrediterad verksamhet vilket ställer höga krav på kvalitet och säkerhet även inom IT-enheten.
   

  

 Nu söker vi en Systemspecialist till enheten Systemförvaltning Lab inom Karolinska VO IT med placering i Huddinge. Resor till andra områden inom stockholm förekommer.
   

  

 Som systemspecialist (teknisk expert) ingår du i en grupp, tillsammans med andra specialister och systemförvaltare inom laboratoriet, med ansvar för laboratoriets IT-system. Du har också det tekniska ansvaret för ett (eller flera) IT-system eller systemfunktioner och även 2:a linjens support på de samma.Du kommer få gott om tid på dig att lära dig systemen och dess uppbyggnad. I rollen ingår även att göra uppgraderingar och systemtester.
   

  

 Systemspecialistens kunskaper skall omfatta:
   

  

* stor teknisk kunskap om systemens uppbyggnad
* Kännedom om databasernas struktur.
* övergripande kännedom om systemens stödjande verksamhetsområden
* ett processorienterat arbetssätt


 Laboratoriet tillämpar Region Stockholms förvaltningsmodell.
   

  

 Systemen körs i windowsmiljö på MS-SQL Server och IIS. Begrepp som förekommer i vardagen är t.ex. EDI, XML, Citrix, analyskoder, remisser och analysinstrument.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som**
* Är van att arbeta både självständigt och i grupp.
* Är lyhörd för användarnas önskemål.
* Tycker om problemlösning, både logisk och teknisk.
* Inte rädd för att fråga, när det är något du inte förstår.
* Kanske idag jobbar med PC/serverdrift och vill ändra inriktning på din karriär.
* Är van att ta egna initiativ och kan bidra till vår sektion med positiv inställning och humor.


**Kvalifikationer**
*Krav:*
* Ett för uppdraget relevant utbildning.
* Erfarenhet av tekniskt arbete med IT-system i kritiska miljöer.
* Erfarenhet av arbete i projektform.
* Kännedom om processorienterat arbetssätt, då vi arbetar enligt ITIL
* Kunskaper om Microsoft SQL för att kunna göra enklare utsökningar.
* Tekniska kunskaper/erfarenhet om serverdrift och operativsystem.
* Tekniska kunskaper om systemdrift (Applikationsnivå)
* Tekniska kunskaper om scriptning (powershell etc)


*Meriterande:*
* Erfarenhet av arbete med IT-system, applikationer och kringutrustning inom Hälso och Sjukvården är meriterande.
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig väl i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska
* Erfarenhet av arbete inom klinisk laboratoriemedicin är meriterande.


**Om rekryteringsprocessen**
 Urval och intervjuer sker fortlöpande under ansökningstiden och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.
   

  

*Varmt välkommen med din ansökan - Tillsammans är vi Karolinska!*
 Inför tillsättning av befattning som innefattar vård av barn och ungdom, kontrolleras den som erbjuds tjänsten mot misstanke- och belastningsregistret. Här kan du läsa mer om rekryteringsprocessen och om vilka kontroller som utförs på Karolinska.
   

  

 Som anställd på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset kan du komma att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om vad det innebär här.
   

  

 Om du är eller tidigare har varit anställd i Region Stockholm kommer vi att ta interna referenser från din nuvarande eller tidigare chef, om du blir aktuell för anställning.
   

  

**Om Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset**
 Vi på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset är stolta över att vi är ett av världens främsta universitetssjukhus. Förutom vårt särskilda ansvar för den högspecialiserade vården i Stockholmsregionen är huvuduppdraget att tillsammans med Karolinska Institutet utbilda framtidens vårdanställda och bedriva världsledande forskning samtidigt som vi fortsätter vårt arbete med att utveckla vården för patientens bästa. Vi arbetar inom en rad olika områden och professioner.
   

  

 Vår vision - Vi ska bota och lindra imorgon det ingen kan bota och lindra idag.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om oss på karolinska.se och följ oss på sociala medier!
   

  

 Att söka jobb i Region Stockholm Vi eftersträvar jämställdhet och jämlikhet på vår arbetsplats och ser gärna sökande med olika bakgrund och förutsättningar. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via detta system. Ansök genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök”. Ansökningar per brev eller e-post beaktas inte. Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser. Vårt rekryteringssystem kan inte hantera anonyma ansökningar eller sökande med skyddade personuppgifter. Om du har skyddade personuppgifter ber vi dig att kontakta den kontaktpersonen som finns angiven i annonsen. Din ansökan kommer då att hanteras utanför rekryteringssystemet. Du bör även vara försiktig med vilken information du lämnar i din ansökan och endast ta med information som är relevant för den aktuella befattningen. Region Stockholm ansvarar för hälso- och sjukvård, kollektivtrafik, regional utveckling och bidrar till kulturlivet. Varje dag, dygnet runt. I landets snabbaste växande region. Tillsammans skapar vi Europas attraktivaste storstadsregion. Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss i Region Stockholm
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Huddinge | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/768 | Kontakt: Johan Saak johan.saak@regionstockholm.se, | Facklig företrädare: Vision vision.karolinska@regionstockholm.se, | Publicerat: 2025-01-29 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-02-05

title: Nordic Project Excellence Lead
company_industry: Architecture and Planning, Construction, and Civil Engineering
description:
**Do you want to shape project delivery in a dynamic and growing organization?**
**With us, you can!**
 WSP is looking for a driven and experienced specialist to lead and develop our project operations in the Nordics, with a particular focus on Sweden. In this role, you will be a key player in driving project delivery, improvement initiatives, and ensuring optimal project outcomes.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
**Project and Program Management (PPM) – Process Lead (RPL)**
* Own the PPM and Opportunity-to-Cash (O2C) workstreams and work closely with process owners and decision-makers.
* Coordinate with other regions to ensure consistent standards and best practices.
* Provide input to the global team to ensure optimal alignment.
* Act as a change agent, driving transformation in Sweden and the Nordics.
* Establish and manage a regional super user community for project management.
* Manage any region-specific language, legal, or compliance requirements.


**Strengthening Project Leadership (SPL) Programme Lead**
* Lead the SPL programme, ensuring our project methodologies are best-in-class and that the right people fill the right roles on our projects.
* Drive excellence in project delivery across Sweden and the Nordic business, being the go-to person for all project delivery matters.
* Lead initiatives to improve and develop project delivery methodologies in line with business needs and priorities.
* Collaborate closely with global and local teams to continually evolve project delivery and ways of working.


**Project Review and Compliance**
* Conduct deep-dive project reviews to identify risks, opportunities, and best practices.
* Support the Project Performance Review process across Sweden and ensure that sectors establish effective equivalent processes.
* Reduction of insurance claims through improved project governance and established delivery frameworks.


**Qualifications**
 We are looking for a strategic and business-minded leader with extensive (10 - 15 years) experience from the area mentioned above. For you to be successful in this role, we value your competence regarding both in financial results and in relationship building.
   

  

 Below you have a list with the basic requirements for this role:
   

  

* A passion for excellence in project delivery and continual improvement, particularly in project governance, risk management, cost budgeting, and revenue recognition.
* A strong understanding of Swedish and global ways of working, with experience managing large projects.
* Excellent collaboration, presentation, and communication skills, with experience developing and delivering training materials.
* The ability to juggle multiple activities and stakeholder interests while remaining organized and focused on top priorities.
* Strong problem-solving abilities with exceptional attention to detail.


**Contact**
* Nordics Executive Commercial and Operations Director, Oliver Wildgoose, oliver.wildgoose@wsp.com
* HR/Recruitment, Catharina Skog, Catharina.skog@wsp.com


**Does this sound like the right role for you?**
 Don’t hesitate to submit your application and become part of our team that is driving world-class project delivery!
   

  

 We review applications continuously, but please submit your application and cower letter in English no later than (2025-02-23). Contact from recruitment agencies, CV and advertisement salespeople will be declined.
   

  

 WSP is one of the world’s leading professional services firms, providing strategic consulting, engineering services, and sustainable solutions across a range of industries, including transportation, infrastructure, environment, climate, energy, water, buildings, and mining. With 66,500 employees worldwide, we bring together experts in analysis, technology, and the environment to help shape the future of our cities and communities. Innovation, integrity, and inclusion are at the core of our culture. In Sweden, we are approximately 4,000 employees.
   

  

 Follow us on WSP Sweden (LinkedIn), WSP Sweden (Facebook), or @wspsweden (Instagram) for more insight into our work and what it’s like to be part of our team.

title: Senior ML/NLP Senior ML/NLP Researcher - Search & Recommendation
description:
**About us** 




 At RavenPack, we are at the forefront of developing the next generation of generative AI tools for the finance industry and beyond. With 20 years of experience as a leading big data analytics provider for financial services, we empower our clients—including some of the world's most successful hedge funds, banks, and asset managers—to enhance returns, reduce risk, and increase efficiency by integrating public information into their models and workflows. Building on this expertise, we are now launching a new suite of GenAI and SaaS services, designed specifically for financial professionals.
 



  





**Join a Company that is Powering the Future of Finance with AI** 




  





 RavenPack has been recognized as the Best Alternative Data Provider by WatersTechnology and has been included in this year’s Top 100 Next Unicorns by Viva Technology. You will be working on Bigdata.com, a next-generation platform aimed at transforming financial decision-making.
 



  





**Only candidates with EU legal working status will be considered** 




  





**We’re looking for** 




  





 RavenPack is searching for a
 **Senior ML/NLP Researcher** 
 to join our Data Solutions Research Team at our Spanish headquarters. We offer competitive compensation and a fun working environment.
 **Please note that this role is based in Marbella.** 
 Relocation assistance is available.
 



  





 As a ML/NLP Researcher you will play a key role creating innovative data products, both supporting internal processes and by engaging directly with clients as part of the product discovery process, allowing you to gather feedback and iterate on development to deliver impactful solutions.
 



 The ability to communicate effectively in English both in writing and verbally is a must.
 



 European legal working status is required.
 



  





**Your Responsibilities:** 



* Collaborate with a team of dedicated professionals to develop data-driven solutions that directly enhance our external products as well as the internal tools and processes that improve the efficiency and effectiveness of those.
* Apply your expertise to tackle real-world challenges, demonstrating the benefits of systematic, data-driven processes. These can range from optimizing systematic processes for curating and maintaining our Knowledge Graphs, and enhancing document contextualization for improved retrieval, to fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) for specialized tasks, and coordinating various agents within LLM-driven workflows, among other possibilities.
* Stay informed about industry trends and advancements in Machine Learning (ML) and Natural Language Processing (NLP) to ensure our solutions remain competitive and relevant.



  





**What We're Looking For:** 



* A Master’s or PhD in a relevant field, with practical, hands-on experience in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and a strong understanding of state-of-the-art language models.
* 5+ years of industry experience, contributing to business growth.
* Exceptional quantitative, analytical, and problem-solving skills, with a proven ability to apply logical and mathematical reasoning to a variety of challenges.
* Experience using deep learning frameworks (Pytorch, HuggingFace..).
* Familiarity with machine learning algorithms and statistical models for time series forecasting.
* A clear and precise communicator who thrives in collaborative environments, working effectively with colleagues from diverse backgrounds and areas of expertise.
* Strong programming experience in Python and familiarity with SQL or other database languages.



  





**Desired Skills:** 



* A proven track record of contributing to original research, with a comfort level in exploring new and uncharted areas while maintaining clarity of purpose.
* Experience in building and coordinating various LLM agents to enhance complex workflows.
* Strong project management skills, ensuring efficient execution and timely delivery of data projects.
* Ideal candidates would have some financial domain expertise.



  





**What's in it for You?** 



* International Culture: With its headquarters in Marbella, Spain, and presence in New York and London, RavenPack takes pride in being a truly diverse global organization.
* Competitive Salary: In RavenPack, we believe that your time and experience needs to be fairly rewarded.
* Continuous learning: We provide the support needed to grow within the team.
* Innovation: Innovation is the key to our success, so we encourage you to speak up and tell us about your vision.
* Hybrid work arrangement
* Shuttle bus: From Malaga, Fuengirola, La Riviera, and Estepona is available for free from the company.
* Diversity is in our DNA! You will work in an international environment (over 29 nationalities and 24 languages spoken!)



  





*We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.*

title: Senior Teknisk Testare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Du kommer att testleda (ca 60%) samt tekniskt testa (ca 40%) Java applikationer, intergrationslager samt kärnbankssystem.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av testledning
* Erfaren av teknisk test
* Mycket goda Java kunskaper
* Har lätt att lära nya tekniker
* Strukturerad
* Nyfiken, gillar att grotta in i teknik


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 05-02-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Experienced (5+ years) platform engineer or software engineer with advanced Cloud & DevOps experience, or similar role with a focus on scalable systems, automation and cloud infrastructure.
* Extensive experience with cloud platforms (at least one of GCP, Azure, AWS, in order of preference)
* Strong engineering mindset of building scalable and high-quality software products, following best practices like code structure, design patterns, testing etc.
* Expert in Python, so you can refactor and optimize other people’s code. Also, advanced knowledge of at least one type-safe programming language (bonus points for Go, and/or Rust)
* Exceptional communication skills in English, you are able to collaborate effectively across teams, and can discuss issues with other experts as well as break down complex problems for non-technical stakeholdersYou passionately test your code and prefer to follow test-driven development
* You have hands-on experience with DevOps and CI/CD & infrastructure automation using tools and frameworks like GitHub Actions, Gitlab CI, Terraform, Docker


**Meritorious**
* Solid understanding of security best practices in cloud and ML environments
* Proficiency in containerization (Docker) and orchestration (k8s) frameworks for scaling ML workflows
* Experience with any of deep learning, graph NNs, LLMs, knowledge graphs, RAGsProven expertise building and maintaining platforms for ML applications
* Experience with ML orchestration tools such as MLflow, Kubeflow, or Apache AirflowFamiliarity with model versioning, A/B testing, and model monitoring strategies


**Application deadline:** 
 06-02-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*
